author: jashwanth kumar
comment: All all  This is for all those people who told it is not working here is tip.  After installing this smart app , if it does not appear on the list, please go to setting - application - all apps and permission  - select smart camera - and then permit the app for what ever permission it asks - thn close every app and restart that smart band app with your smart band connected it will appear in the application session on the smart band and you can control your camera with the band
